desc: Performance Parts & Accessories for BMW R9T motorcycles. Handbuilt, bespoke motorcycle parts for custom motorbikes. Specialists in BMW parts, fabrication and customising for new and old BMW boxer motorcycles. Based in Brighton & Hove, UK.

layout.text: We specialise in fabricating and retailing BMW R9T parts, accessories & custom kits which we use on our own bike builds. We have BMW R nine T air box removal kits, battery boxes, performance air filters and more.
